rows.label: tlk45320152_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The Superbian Empire is vast and
powerful, but it is not without its
internal struggles.

rows.label: tlk45320152_03_msg0002
rows.name:
There is an anti-imperial organization
known as Brionac.

rows.label: tlk45320152_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Their goal is to replace His Majesty
the Emperor Nefer with another of
their choosing.

rows.label: tlk45320152_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Apparently many soldiers who left the
Imperial Army over the years have
allied themselves with these people.

rows.label: tlk45320152_03_msg0005
rows.name:
They even have Divine Beast weapons of
their own. A dangerous lot, to be sure.
